snippet: A group of Jets fans seeking the firing of General Manager John Idzik have joined the increasing number of sports devotees conducting electronic campaigns to pursue such goals.
abstract: Group of New York Jets fans are using social media for sideline and front-office changes; fans have chosen general manager John Idzik as unfortunate punching bag for their frustrations over Jets’ quarterbacks and cornerbacks, and what they feel have been dubious draft choices and miserly free-agent spending.
lead_paragraph: A group of Jets fans seeking the firing of General Manager John Idzik have joined the increasing number of sports devotees conducting electronic campaigns to pursue such goals.

headline.main: Fans Unload (and Upload) Ire, Urging Firings of Coaches and Executives
headline.print_headline: Fans Unload (and Upload) Ire, Urging Firings of Coaches and Executives
